Content-Type: text/plain

Hi, 

here is a patch to add the a proxy server to the crawl
settings. Patch wise its awful because I auto formated 
the code in Eclipse and so the format of the code doesn't 
fit properly and the patch then removes the whole file and 
adds a new one :-( 

The way I solved problems like this in my last company was to 
require *everyone* to run the code autoformatter in Eclipse 
prior to check in. That way everyones coding idiosyncrasies where 
smoothed away and diffs etc. all worked very nicely.

The proxy and host can be set in the job settings using this 
patch. 

cheers 

mark 

--=-TdI7xsnpaTu75+/qiyaH
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=proxy.patch
Content-Type: text/x-patch; name=proxy.patch; charset=utf-8
